page.title: 11BORROWASH,LOCAL INDUSTRY
page.content: Local industies can be found in BORROWASH but few serve more than the immediate area of the block.Two local firms who serve a wider area than most are {G.I.C.}and {BIRKINS.} {G.I.C.}stands for GENERAL INDUSTRIAL CLEANERS,the firm cleans the overalls of many companies including Jaguar,Vauxhall,G.M. and Opel.The factory was built in 1938 and employs 400 people.A new venture is {KITCARE} in which G.I.C.wash,dry,iron and then return sports teams' kit. {BIRKINS }make lace, the company has been in existence for 125 years but has been in its present premises for only 7 years.The factory is fully computerised and the machine produced lace is used for curtains, table-cloths,dresses and ladies underwear. Both factory sites replaced old mills.
